attributes.action: ensure that all Health and Social Service authorites provided a combined 'joined up' service for adults and children with Aspergers syndrome along the lines of the Liverpool model, to include provision of Aspergers-specialised psychiatric services for those in need
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people with Aspergers fall into the gap between Mental Health and Learning Disability services, and thus end up left at the side of the road, excluding a potentially intelligent group of people from contributing to society
